my heart is ready~; I will sing: psaltery and harp~; I will arise in the morning early.

my heart is ready~; I will sing: and I will sing unto thee among the nations

O God: and thy truth even unto the clouds.

my heart is ready~; I will sing: and thy glory over all the earth

8 ^ God hath spoken in his holiness
my heart is ready~; I will sing: and I will divide Sichem and I will mete out the vale of tabernacles.
and Ephraim the protection of my head~; Judah is my king.

my heart is ready~; I will sing: who hast cast us off~? And wilt not thou

O God: for vain is the help of man.

2 ^ My heart is ready: 14 ^ Through God we shall do mightily
O God: and he will bring our enemies to nothing.
